content:encoded:
Case Closed begins with The Adventures Of Sam Spade this week. We’ll hear his story from July 11, 1948, The Wheel Of Life Caper.

(30:34) Our second story is The Betty Moran Case, from Richard Diamond, Private Detective. That story aired May 29, 1949.
